name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: U of Illinois Library Amazon Browser

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: On Amazon, this extension displays books available in the U of Illinois, I-Share, Champaign Public Libraries, and WorldCat.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
On Amazon, this extension displays books available in the University of Illinois Library, I-Share, Urbana-Champaign Public Libraries, and WorldCat. It also provides links to the University of Illinois Library's catalog for CDs and DVDs.

Ver. 5.5 
Added the search functionality for Urbana-Champaign public libraries.
